This has meant users are unable to use the bluetooth function to use the spotify app on car radio and unable to connect bluetooth. Phone is able to stream via bluetooth connect but not through spotify app on phone and car radio.

content: Lock screen widget has disappeared. Music constantly stops playing. The bar showing artist and title has also disappeared.

I have been using Spotify premium. Biggest dissapointment is the way the app behaves when you are offline. I downloaded my playlist before my trip so I can listen to them offline. But the app doesn't let me in when I'm offline and instead takes me to the login page. Having inconsistent internet connection during the trip meant I could no longer login and access the downloaded songs. Also, when I managed to log back in later using a slow internet connection, the app tried to download all the downloaded songs again which was not possible with the limited slow internet that I had during the trip. App is not designed to be your travel companion and can be enjoyed only in home where you have proper internet connection. For travel and trips where you need offline access to your favourties playlists, Spotify premium doesn't help. Looking at other options.

content: I've been using Spotify for years. Didn't have very many complaints over that time until recently. The glitches have been ridiculous. To me one of the basic requirements for an app is that it doesn't crash a dozen times a day. This app has not been meeting that requirement. I have started researching other music streaming apps and will definitely switch if things don't get better soon.

Although I like Spotify and I use it a lot (and I also appreciate that Spotify is one of the few big-tech companies that doesn't mess up with dirty business andis "not that" censoring), mobile Android app gets more and more clumpsy lately. App is sometimes not downloading albums for offline listening or it is downloading but the process hangs up for a really long time (even with good connection). Also if I "undownload" album, it sometimes download albums again for some unknown reason after a while. Another issue: App is not switching between offline and online mode fluently. I think that Spotify is company that is big enough to implement the ability of auto switching between offline and online mode accoridng to my current connection/non-connection. App just doesn't work offline until I switch it manually to Offline mode in Settings. Why I should do this manually all the time? Why it cannot just auto-switch when I don't have internet connection? Also, I don't understand why is Spotify constantly messing with my Settings of sound quality although when I manually set it to specific quality.

There's no way to share a song with another Spotify user, through Spotify. You can copy the link to your clipboard, email, text or post the song on social media, but you CANNOT send a song THROUGH Spotify to another another Spotify user. That's like the equivalent of Facebook not letting you share a post with your FB friend inside FB, but instead requiring you to send it to them through Gmail. Yea, I know, it sounds utterly ridiculous, but that's what Spotify does for some stupid reason!

content: The app is nice but it's really irritating how many adds there are I open the app listen to the add for 30 minutes if uninterrupted listening I listened to one 3 minute song and it plays 5 adds after Spotify premium is way to expensive they need to lower the cost or cut some adds

Excellent app. Very well made and categorized. However the fact that I got an ad slot of 7 ads at once and the fact that the first ad was one for 30 minutes of uninterrupted listening truly infuriates me. Also, they need to fix their billing system. I had gotten a google play gift card to buy premium but it didn't work.

I love the experience on this app, but with Premuim it gets better... The only problem is that I can't see or access the Lyrics Feature, Lyrics don't work on my phone (SM A03 Core), This is is big problem.
Offers all the artists & podcasts that I want, but every update makes it worse. It's been a year and this is still true.
I do really like spotify but when I'm playing a song it won't pop up can you fix that and also the recommendations thing you add for my mixes please remove it its so annoying

App is very fantastic but they have so many ads ... I liked a song and then I heard it for a few days but never heard it again . they said "You discovered a premium future" I want play again please solve this..
Problem is am finding it difficult to play music in my play list. And it's impossible to repeat or play a previous song. Is it that I don't know how to use this app or what?
The advertising is killing me, 3/4 songs then advertising. Someone changed my setting, I don't like editing of my songs
PLEASE make playlists for podcasts where it will play the latest episodes of eg. three podcasts I have added to a playlist. Like in daily drive, but customisable!
Great selection of music and other audio media but app will stop play between songs or drop out during one.
Sometimes during listening app's causing crash.

App has had some bugs for a while now (3 months or so) tried finding information on their website...nothing. Tried finding a way to report a bug... nothing. Tried messaging their fb page, no messages allowed. I don't know what to do or how to get the issue addressed. The issue isnt app breaking but a new feature was released and I used it loads then it started breaking and its gotten worse not better. Just unimpressed by the lack of convenience of such a huge brand...
I like this app. But recently I found a bug where I can't clear Spotify's playback notification in single swipe.

Love the amount of music available and the download option. However, after every update it always breaks the app, this months issue includes music playing but not showing what is playing. Closing the app 3 to 5 tines fixes it. Updates never fix anything
Love Spotify! My only beef is whenever I watch a podcast the screen goes dark and won't come back. Could be my phone idk. Also stops playing all the time!

Spotify is really a boon for music lovers Have enjoyed listening to my liked list on repeat mode. But it is really disturbing to have 2 to 3 ads after 1 or 2 songs everytime. It will be good if the frequency of ads is reduced and there is more of music
Please, I'm having a hard time trying to play the podcast videos, I've cleared my cache, uninstalled the app..but still can't see the video.
Great music and everything is amazing except the fact that you have to pay for premium to download

It's an okay app. Reason I use this is because it has the original and remixed versions of songs without having to pay for it.but here's a few things I don't like: 1: I made a Michael jackson playlist, and it added a ghostbusters song to it.. And I can't delete it. 2: When I make a playlist, I add a few songs, and want to listen to more like them. So I click similar. It either shows the same songs, or very little quantity of them. 3: When I'm listening, sometimes the song will just cut off.

I don't like how it bugs every once and a while like when I really need it to work. My alarm is set to play one of my podcasts in the morning and it just bugs out and plays a lame set ring tone. I don't like how it makes me log out and log back in for it to work again

It's pretty good when your on road trips ot you just want to listen to music ,but the app keeps on adding songs to my playlists and I cant listen to nt songs because they are buried deep within the songs that spotify added and also the advertisements are annoying
I love it but it keeps adding stuff to my playlists Its annoying

The app is great! I understand that you need money and stuff, but the fact you can't listen to your songs in your Playlist or Listen to a FULL song that you want to listen to is just disappointing. I'm terribly sorry but it's ok, I just don't like that idea, but it's yours and I guess its ok, I mean, all apps have something you have to pay for. - MY opinion, sorry
Only give 3 stars caz. of adds caz they says 30 min of uninterrupted music and adds comes after every music
Way too many ads, a non premium user has to struggle to listen to any songs. Not even 30mins you'll get ad less listening.

My experience would be higher if I hadn't started experiencing the extremely annoying problem of my songs getting stuck in a loop, where I need to manually go in and click a song after the loop to get it to move forward. 1-2-3-4-5-1-2-3 etc. In the middle of a playlist.

Two missing stars for the lack of two important features that the competition do better. Flow with deezer and searching for a sing song playing in the background. Three stars for remote control and great library. I don't enjoy daily mix and my playlist /song radio give me 5 songs on repeat.
Had my account for years.....and now sonce the last update ....The app is glitchy as hell.now.....Please fix this
